p: Mutations in the FBXO7 gene ( PARK15) encoding for F-box only protein 7 (FBXO7) causes autosomal recessive early onset PD. FBXO7 has been shown to ubiquitinate TOMM20 [ 77] ( Figure 1 â€” signal amplification), and to act in a common mitophagy pathway with PINK1 and Parkin, with overexpression of human FBXO7 in Drosophila rescuing a Parkin loss-of-function phenotype [ 78].
